documentation.text:
@dev Returns the name of the pool
 @return string The name of the pool

@dev Returns the address of the pool's farm
 @return address Address of the pool's farm

@dev Return the pool manager's address
 @return address Address of the pool's manager

@dev Returns the currency address and balance of each position the pool has, as well as the cumulative value
 @return (address[], uint[], uint) Currency address and balance of each position the pool has, and the cumulative value of positions

@dev Returns the amount of stable coins the pool has to invest
 @return uint Amount of stable coin the pool has available

@dev Returns the value of the pool in USD
 @return uint Value of the pool in USD

@dev Returns the balance of the user in USD
 @return uint Balance of the user in USD

@dev Updates the pool's farm address
 @param farmAddress Address of the pool's farm

@dev Returns the pool's performance fee
 @return uint The pool's performance fee

@dev Returns the name of the pool
 @return string The name of the pool

@dev Returns the address of the pool's farm
 @return address Address of the pool's farm

@dev Return the pool manager's address
 @return address Address of the pool's manager

@dev Returns the currency address and balance of each position the pool has, as well as the cumulative value
 @return (address[], uint[], uint) Currency address and balance of each position the pool has, and the cumulative value of positions

@dev Returns the amount of stable coins the pool has to invest
 @return uint Amount of stable coin the pool has available

@dev Returns the value of the pool in USD
 @return uint Value of the pool in USD

@dev Returns the balance of the user in USD
 @return uint Balance of the user in USD

 @param farmAddress Address of the pool's farm

balanceOf(address).details: Returns the number of LP tokens the user has

returns._0: uint Number of LP tokens the user has

deposit(address,uint256).details: Deposits the given USD amount into the pool

params.amount: Amount of USD to deposit into the pool

getAvailableFunds().details: Returns the amount of stable coins the pool has to invest

returns._0: uint Amount of stable coin the pool has available

getFarmAddress().details: Returns the address of the pool's farm

returns._0: address Address of the pool's farm
address Address of the pool's manager

getPoolBalance().details: Returns the value of the pool in USD

returns._0: uint Value of the pool in USD

getPositionsAndTotal().details: Returns the currency address and balance of each position the pool has, as well as the cumulative value

returns._0: (address[], uint[], uint) Currency address and balance of each position the pool has, and the cumulative value of positions

getUSDBalance(address).details: Returns the balance of the user in USD

returns._0: uint Balance of the user in USD

name().details: Returns the name of the pool

returns._0: string The name of the pool

placeOrder(address,bool,uint256).details: Places an order to buy/sell the given currency

params.buyOrSell: Whether the user is buying or selling
params.numberOfTokens: Number of tokens of the given currency

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Withdraws the given USD amount on behalf of the user

params.amount: Amount of USD to withdraw from the pool
